mvc.controllers

Class GamePlayController

  • java.lang.Object
    • mvc.util.FXController
      • mvc.controllers.GamePlayController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class GamePlayController
extends FXController
    Main game play controller. It's the most difficult. Here're all game logic.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description

      Animation of pointer's spawn.

      This class implements abstract class ExtendedAnimationTimer.
      private static class  GamePlayController.PointerSpawnState
      This enum is used in GamePlayController.FieldDrawAnimation, there're states/"frames"/points of pointer spawn animation.
      private static class  GamePlayController.StepCause
      Enum with causes of steps.

    • Field Detail

      • primaryStage

        private volatile javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage
        Link to primary stage. Here it's used for attaching event handlers such as key handlers.

      • CELL_SIZE

        public static final int CELL_SIZE
        Size of one cell. It's quite important constant, it's used when controller redraws game field.
        See Also:
        redrawField(), Constant Field Values

      • pointerX

        private volatile int pointerX
        This pointer points, on what X coordinate is it now. Note: it's a co-ord on canvas, not on level.

      • pointerY

        private volatile int pointerY
        This pointer points, on what Y coordinate is it now. Note: it's a co-ord on canvas, not on level.

      • GAME_POINTER_SIZE

        private static final int GAME_POINTER_SIZE
        Maximum size of game pointer.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • GAME_POINTER_COLOR

        private static final javafx.scene.paint.Color GAME_POINTER_COLOR
        Color of game pointer.

      • levelWidth

        private volatile int levelWidth
        Width of level. Note: it's size of grid, not of level.

      • levelHeight

        private volatile int levelHeight
        Height of level. Note: it's size of grid, not of level.

      • movingPointer

        private volatile boolean movingPointer
        This' variables name says about himself. It's used to make game pointer move just in one direction on one keypress.

      • gameCanvas

        private volatile javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas gameCanvas
        Game canvas from .fxml file.

      • graphics

        private volatile javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext graphics
        Link to gameCanvas' graphics. Just for time economy.

      • undoStack

        private volatile LIFOQueue<java.lang.String> undoStack
        Undo stack for moves. When you press Ctrl+Z or use button "Undo" - last move from this stack moves to redoStack. And also, this move executes.

        Note: this stack appends when you move.

        See Also:
        doUndo(), doRedo()

      • redoStack

        private volatile LIFOQueue<java.lang.String> redoStack
        Redo stack for moves. When you press Ctrl+R or use button "Redo" - last move from this stack moves to undoStack. And also, this move executes.
        See Also:
        doUndo(), doRedo()

      • exitDialog

        private volatile javafx.scene.control.Alert exitDialog
        Exit dialog object.

      • EXIT_OPTION

        private static final javafx.scene.control.ButtonType EXIT_OPTION
        Exit action of exit dialog.

      • CANCEL_OPTION

        private static final javafx.scene.control.ButtonType CANCEL_OPTION
        Cancel action of exit dialog.

      • GP_MOVE_EVENT_HANDLER

        private volatile javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent> GP_MOVE_EVENT_HANDLER
        Handler for key input. Extracted to object because I need to remove it from list of handlers when actionButtonPressed(ActionEvent) receives action from "end game" button.

      • stepLines

        private volatile java.util.ArrayList<com.sun.javafx.geom.Line2D> stepLines
        Lines that GP leaves after moving.

      • undoFlag

        private volatile boolean undoFlag
        This flag is set when actionButtonPressed(ActionEvent) receives event from undo button.

      • startCellX

        public volatile int startCellX
        X position of starting cell.

      • startCellY

        public volatile int startCellY
        Y position of starting cell.

      • startTime

        private volatile double startTime

      • startCell

        private volatile LevelCell startCell

      • delay

        private void delay(long howLong)
        Safe wrapper for Thread.sleep(long).
        Parameters:
        howLong - delay time in milliseconds
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if catches InterruptedException, and sets cause to caught InterruptedException.

        Removes KeyEvent handler for moving GP.

      • init

        public void init()
        Initializes controller's components. This method is activated when SceneLoader.loadPackage(String) loads scene, this thing is like constructor or JavaFX's native initialize.
        Specified by:
        init in class FXController

      • run

        public void run()
        This method is called after Main.changeScene(String, String) have been used. Runs controller.
        Specified by:
        run in class FXController

      • reset

        public void reset()
        This method is called after Main.changeScene(String, String) have been used. Is used to reset controller's old data.
        Specified by:
        reset in class FXController

      • drawFinish

        private void drawFinish(int x,
                        int y)
        Draws finish cell. Finish is 4x4 grid in cell. And, for drawing finish columns as normal, I use variable fillColumnShift. When loop for y axis starts, variable fillBlack sets to shift variable. When this loop ends, fillColumnShift inverts.
        Parameters:
        x - x of cell
        y - y of cell

      • redrawFieldCell

        private void redrawFieldCell(int x,
                             int y)
        Redraws one cell on field.
        Parameters:
        x - x position of cell. Note: it's position in Level.grid, not in canvas.
        y - y position of cell. Note: it's position in Level.grid, not in canvas.

      • redrawField

        private void redrawField()
        Redraws all field.

        Parameters:
        event - action event from button
